FuncDef:
The match-type srv6-te-policy dscp command sets the type of an SRv6 mapping policy to DSCP.
The undo match-type srv6-te-policy dscp command deletes the type set for an SRv6 mapping policy.
By default, the type of an SRv6 mapping policy is not set.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In an SRv6 TE Policy scenario, to set the type of an SRv6 mapping policy to DSCP, run the match-type srv6-te-policy dscp command. Then, you can run the color match dscp command to configure the mappings between color and DSCP values.
Precautions
Before changing the type of an SRv6 mapping policy, you need to delete all the configured mappings.
